nodes.text: The Hardex system was a star system that was located within the Jubilar sector, a part of the galactic regions known as the Outer Rim Territories and the Slice. It was home to the sentient Hardex species.
The Hardex system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square T-7.
